[Home](./index.md) &gt; [opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.md) &gt; [ChromeDocTitle](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromedoctitle.md)

## ChromeDocTitle interface

APIs for accessing and updating the document title.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ChromeDocTitle 
```

## Example 1

How to change the title of the document

```ts
chrome.docTitle.change('My application')

```

## Example 2

How to reset the title of the document to it's initial value

```ts
chrome.docTitle.reset()

```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [change(newTitle)](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromedoctitle.change.md) | Changes the current document title. |
|  [reset()](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromedoctitle.reset.md) | Resets the document title to it's initial value. (meaning the one present in the title meta at application load.) |
